$ZIM IMO Putin's war on Ukraine is not about him wanting the assets in Ukraine
created_at: its about controlling the shipping routes on the black sea... How do ships get into the Black Sea? The Black Sea drains into the Mediterranean Sea
column3: via the Aegean Sea and various straits
column4: and is navigable to the Atlantic Ocean. The Bosphorus Strait connects it to the Sea of Marmara
column5: and the Strait of the Dardanelles connects that sea to the Aegean Sea region of the Mediterranean. If he controls the the Black Sea he controls a lot of shipping to the European countries that border the Black Sea
column6: Putin deosn't care about the assets or businesses in Ukraine
column7: he has already destroyed and devastated most of that!!
